title: WisdomTree (WT) Launches Private Credit Fund Using Blockchain For Retail and Institutional Investors - Yahoo Finance
summary:
WisdomTree recently launched the WisdomTree Private Credit and Alternative Income Digital Fund utilizing tokenized structures to target crypto-native investors, a move showcasing innovation in digital asset management.
This launch, alongside the introduction of other funds like the WisdomTree Europe Defense Fund and WisdomTree GeoAlpha Opportunities Fund, underscores WisdomTree's focus on diversifying its offerings.
During the last quarter, WisdomTree's share price rose by 40%, influenced by these product-related announcements amid a generally bullish market trend.
The introduction of new products, like the Private Credit and Alternative Income Digital Fund, could impact future revenue and earnings forecasts by introducing fresh revenue streams.
Currently trading at US$14.11, WisdomTree shares are slightly below the consensus price target of US$14.35, suggesting limited upside based on analyst predictions.

title: WisdomTree launches tokenized fund offering access to private credit (WT:NYSE) - Seeking Alpha
summary:
WisdomTree (NYSE:WT) rolled out a tokenized fund providing crypto-native investors and institutions exposure to traditionally hard-to-access private credit, it said on Friday.
The WisdomTree Private Credit and Alternative Income Digital Fund (token ticker: CRDT; fund ticker: CRDYX) seeks to track the price and yield performance

title: DeFi Protocol Ondo Finance's Token Soars Amid Tokenization Hype - Yahoo Finance
summary:
The token belonging to decentralized finance-focused asset manager and tech firm Ondo Finance is extending gains this week alongside a rising crypto market and fresh headlines related to the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock.
Ondo is up nearly 10% on the day to $1.10 after clocking more than 21% gains this week, CoinGecko data shows.
Thursday's gains follow last week's launch of tokenized versions of more than 100 U.S.-listed stocks, ETFs, and other equities on Ethereum via the DeFi protocol's Global Markets platform.
That all but “underscores the project’s strong early traction,” Yuen said.
Ondo Finance's total value locked, meanwhile, has nearly tripled since the start of 2025, growing from $611 million to $1.57 billion, DefiLlama data shows.

title: Former Goldman Sachs CEO during 2008 crash says markets are 'due' for a crisis - Fortune
summary:
He added that plenty of assets are being placed in insurers as a way for those companies to generate higher yields on long-term liabilities.
Risks of the U.S. private credit market Blankfein’s concerns about the narrowing of credit spreads and the continuing swell of private credit speak to potentially hidden risks.
Credit spreads are at their tightest in about 20 years, meaning there is little difference in yields between corporate bonds compared to government bonds.
Private credit has similarly boomed, becoming a $1.7 trillion-dollar industry, as higher interest rates lead to higher yields for investors.
JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon warned in July that private credit could become a “recipe for a financial crisis.”
